avengers.name: Iron Man
avengers.description: A billionaire inventor who builds a high-tech suit of armor to become Iron Man

avengers.name: Captain America
avengers.description: A super-soldier from World War II who wields a vibranium shield

avengers.name: Thor
avengers.description: The Asgardian prince who wields the enchanted hammer Mjolnir

avengers.name: Hulk
avengers.description: A scientist who transforms into a giant green monster when angry

avengers.name: Black Widow
avengers.description: A former Russian spy turned Avenger with exceptional combat skills

avengers.name: Ant Man
avengers.description: A scientist who can shrink to the size of an ant while increasing his strength

avengers.name: Hawkeye
avengers.description: A skilled marksman who uses a bow and arrow with incredible precision

avengers.name: Scarlet Witch
avengers.description: A powerful sorceress with the ability to alter reality

avengers.name: Vision
avengers.description: A synthezoid created from vibranium and the Mind Stone

avengers.name: Doctor Strange
avengers.description: A former neurosurgeon who becomes the Sorcerer Supreme to protect the world

avengers.name: Spiderman
avengers.description: A young superhero with spider-like abilities who fights crime in New York City
